enWisdom: He (‘a) said about the one whom he censured: If he falls sick he regrets having abandoned the work
Indeed you are the target of calamities and the object of sicknesses

Wisdom: بِقَدْرِ عُلُوِّ الرِّفْعَةِ تَكُونُ نِكَايَةُ الْوَقْعَةِ
enWisdom: The harm that one faces in calamity is to the extent of [the loftiness of] one’s rank

Wisdom: إِذَا رَأَيْتَ رَبَّكَ يُوَالِي عَلَيْكَ الْبَلَاءَ فَاشْكُرْهُ
enWisdom: When you see your Lord continually testing you [with hardships] then be grateful to Him

Wisdom: بِالتَّعَبِ الشَّدِيدِ تُدْرَكُ الدَّرَجَاتُ الرَّفِيعَةُ وَالرَّاحَةُ الدَّائِمَةُ
enWisdom: It is with great difficulty that lofty ranks and perpetual bliss are attained

Wisdom: بَلَاءُ الرَّجُلِ عَلَى قَدْرِ إِيمَانِهِ وَدِينِهِ
enWisdom: The trial of a man is proportionate to his faith and religion

Wisdom: عِنْدَ نُزُولِ الْمَصَائِبِ وَتَعَاقُبِ النَّوَائِبِ تَظْهَرُ فَضِيلَةُ الصَّبْرِ
enWisdom: During the descending of hardships and successive adversities, the excellence of patience becomes manifest

Wisdom: لَمْ يَصْفُ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ الدُّنْيَا لِأَوْلِيَائِهِ وَلَمْ يَضُنَّ بِهَا عَلَى أَعْدَائِهِ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, has not cleansed this world for His friends nor has He withheld it from His enemies
One who loves us should prepare to be covered with afflictions
One who befriends us should have a thick skin for tribulations [that will befall him]

Wisdom: لَا يُقَصِّرُ الْمُؤْمِنُ عَنِ احْتِمَالٍ وَلَا يَجْزَعُ لِرَزِيَّةٍ
enWisdom: A believer never falls short of forbearance and never gets anxious when faced with difficulty

Wisdom: لَا تَفْرَحْ بِالْغِنَاءِ وَالرَّخَاءِ وَلَا تَغْتَمَّ بِالْفَقْرِ وَ الْبَلَاءِ فَإِنَّ الذَّهَبَ يُجَرَّبُ بِالنَّارِ وَالْمُؤْمِنَ يُجَرَّبُ بِالْبَلَاءِ
enWisdom: Do not be delighted by wealth and comfort, and do not be grieved by poverty and tribulation, for verily gold is tested by fire and the believer is tested by tribulation

Wisdom: لَا يَكْمُلُ السُّؤْدَدُ إِلَّا بِتَحَمُّلِ الْأَثْقَالِ وَإِسْدَاءِ الضَّائِعِ
enWisdom: Eminence is not perfected except by bearing the burdens [of others] and doing good turns
One who feels secure from the devising [of Allah] meets with harm
One who feels secure from the devising of Allah is destroyed

Wisdom: إِنَّ لِلَّهِ تَعَالَى فِي السَّرَّاءِ نِعْمَةَ الْإِفْضَالِ وَفِي الضَّرَّاءِ نِعْمَةَ التَّطْهِيرِ
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Most High, bestows the blessing of benevolence in [times of] ease and the blessing of purification [in times] of hardship
